variables.name: RUST_BACKTRACE
variables.description: Controls whether Rojo displays a full backtrace when it crashes. Set to 1 to enable backtrace output, any other value disables it.

variables.name: ROJO_SYNCBACK_DEBUG
variables.description: Debug environment variable to override the format used for model files during syncback. By default, syncback uses Rbxm format. Set to 1 to use Rbxmx format, or 2 to use JsonModel format. This only affects new files, not existing Rbxm middleware.

variables.name: RUST_LOG
variables.description: Controls logging verbosity. Set to specify which modules to log at what level (e.g., 'info', 'debug', 'librojo=trace'). Can be overridden using --verbose/-v flag on the command line.
